name: Saturn Power No. 1
overview: Core Demo Disc is a demo disc released for the Sega Saturn in Europe. It contains playable demos of Tomb Raider, Swagman and Blam! Machinehead, plus a "rolling demo" of the unreleased Saturn game, Fighting Force, all developed by Core Design. This disc was released twice, having also been bundled with the first issue of Saturn Power and titled Saturn Power No. 1
